title: Autistic Syndrome 1
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Autism
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychotherapy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Twins
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
description: Presents some aspects of psychotherapy in a three year old autistic girl during her first year of residential treatment. We see her with her twin sister and with her therapist. A year later the twin sisters are observed with interest focused on changes in behaviour. No other credits available.
